org.drip.learning.regularization

Interface RegularizerRdToR1

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RegularizerRdCombinatorialToR1Continuous, RegularizerRdContinuousToR1Continuous

    public interface RegularizerRdToR1
    RegularizerRdxToR1 exposes the Structural Loss and Risk Calculations for the specified Normed R^d To Normed R^1 Learning Function. The References are: 1) Alon, N., S. Ben-David, N. Cesa Bianchi, and D. Haussler (1997): Scale-sensitive Dimensions, Uniform Convergence, and Learnability, Journal of Association of Computational Machinery, 44 (4) 615-631. 2) Anthony, M., and P. L. Bartlett (1999): Artificial Neural Network Learning - Theoretical Foundations, Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, UK. 3) Kearns, M. J., R. E. Schapire, and L. M. Sellie (1994): Towards Efficient Agnostic Learning, Machine Learning, 17 (2) 115-141. 4) Lee, W. S., P. L. Bartlett, and R. C. Williamson (1998): The Importance of Convexity in Learning with Squared Loss, IEEE Transactions on Information Theory, 44 1974-1980. 5) Vapnik, V. N. (1998): Statistical Learning Theory, Wiley, New York.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
